sqlMap.select: select LYR_PK, UP_LYR, LYR_ID, CLS_GBN, CLS_LVL, LVL1_NM, LVL2_NM, LVL3_NM, LOWER(LYR_SYMBOL) AS LYR_SYMBOL from MAP_LYRLIST order by SORT_ODR

select USER_ID,LYR_ON from MAP_LYRLIST_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE#
USER_ID LIKE '%' || #USER_ID# || '%'

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.OBJECTID, A.FTR_CDE, A.BLD_NAM, A.DBL_NAM, A.AAA_CDE, A.AAB_CDE, A.BJD_CDE, (SELECT BJD_NAM FROM BML_BADM_AS WHERE BJD_CDE = A.BJD_CDE) AS BJD_NAM, A.HJD_CDE, (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM BML_HADM_AS WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM, A.SAN_CDE, A.FAC_NUM, A.FAD_NUM, A.NRD_NAM, A.NFC_NUM, A.NFD_NUM, A.BLD_HIT, A.IMP_CDE, A.BLD_USE, A.HJG_CDE, (SELECT HJG_NAM FROM BML_GADM_AS WHERE HJG_CDE = A.HJG_CDE) AS HJG_NAM, BJD_CDE || SAN_CDE + 1 || DECODE(TRIM(FAC_NUM), '', '0000', LPAD(TRIM(FAC_NUM), 4, '0')) || DECODE(TRIM(FAD_NUM), '', '0000', LPAD(TRIM(FAD_NUM), 4, '0')) PNU FROM BML_BLDG_AS A WHERE 1=1
A.BLD_NAM LIKE '%' || #BLD_NAM# || '%'
ORDER BY A.BLD_NAM ASC ) B WHERE rnum <= #lastIndex# and rnum > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BML_BLDG_AS WHERE 1=1
BLD_NAM LIKE '%' || #BLD_NAM# || '%'

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, OBJECTID, PNU, (SELECT BJD_NAM FROM BML_BADM_AS WHERE BJD_CDE = SUBSTR(PNU,0,10)) AS HJD_NAM, JIBUN FROM LP_PA_BBND WHERE 1=1
PNU LIKE '%' || #PNU# || '%'
ORDER BY PNU ASC ) A WHERE rnum <= #lastIndex# and rnum > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LP_PA_BBND WHERE 1=1
PNU LIKE '%' || #PNU# || '%'

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT(RN) RN, ROWNUM rnum, OBJECTID, AG_GID, SIG_CD, RDS_MAN_NO, RN_CD, ENG_RN , NTFC_DE, RN_DLB_DE, ROA_MAN_ES, WDR_RD_CD , ROA_CLS_SE, RDS_DPN_SE, RBP_CN, REP_CN, ROAD_BT, ROAD_LT, BSI_INT, NLR_LCL_NO, ALWNC_RESN FROM TL_SPRD_MANAGE WHERE 1=1
RN LIKE '%' || #RN# || '%'
ORDER BY RN ASC ) A WHERE rnum <= #lastIndex# and rnum > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM TL_SPRD_MANAGE WHERE 1=1
RN LIKE '%' || #RN# || '%'

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, T.OBJECTID, T.AG_GID, T.BUL_MAN_NO, T.SIG_CD, T.RN_CD, T.RDS_MAN_NO, T.BSI_INT_SN, T.EQB_MAN_SN, T.BULD_SE_CD, trim(T.BULD_MNNM) as BULD_MNNM, trim(T.BULD_SLNO) as BULD_SLNO, trim(T.BULD_NM) as BULD_NM, T.BUL_ENG_NM, T.BULD_NM_DC, T.BULD_STTUS, T.BDTYP_CD, T.BUL_DPN_SE, T.GRO_FLO_CO, T.UND_FLO_CO, T.ZIP, T.POS_BUL_NM, T.REG_PUB_NM, T.EMD_CD, T.LI_CD, T.MNTN_YN, T.LNBR_MNNM, T.LNBR_SLNO, T.COMPET_DE, T.NTFC_DE, T.MVM_RES_CD, SUBSTR(T.BD_MGT_SN, 0, 19) PNU FROM TL_SPBD_BULD T WHERE T.RN_CD = (SELECT DISTINCT RN_CD FROM TL_SPRD_MANAGE WHERE 1=1
RN = #RN#
)
BULD_MNNM LIKE '%' || #BULD_MNNM# || '%'
BULD_SLNO LIKE '%' || #BULD_SLNO# || '%'
ORDER BY T.BULD_NM ASC ) A WHERE rnum <= #lastIndex# and rnum > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM TL_SPBD_BULD T WHERE T.RN_CD = (SELECT DISTINCT RN_CD FROM TL_SPRD_MANAGE WHERE 1=1
RN = #RN#
)
BULD_MNNM LIKE '%' || #BULD_MNNM# || '%'
BULD_SLNO LIKE '%' || #BULD_SLNO# || '%'
SELECT * FROM MAP_DRAW_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# ORDER BY SEQ
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM LINE_PRINT WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND DRAW_NAME = #DRAW_NAME#
DELETE FROM POINT_PRINT WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND DRAW_NAME = #DRAW_NAME#
DELETE FROM POLYGON_PRINT WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND DRAW_NAME = #DRAW_NAME#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM MAP_DRAW_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND DRAW_NAME = #DRAW_NAME#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MAP_LYRDTL_INFO ( SEQ ,USER_ID ,SYSTEM_ID ,LYR_ID ,FILL_COLOR ,FILL_STYLE ,OUTLINE_COLOR ,OUTLINE_STYLE ,OUTLINE_WIDTH ,FONT_SIZE ,FONT_WEIGHT ,FONT_STYLE ,FONT_FAMILY ,FONT_COLOR ,GEOMETRY_TYPE ,MAXSCALE ,MINSCALE ,OPACITY ,LABEL_FIELD ,LEGEND_NUM ,LEGEND_NM ,MARKER_STYLE ) VALUES ( MAP_DRAW_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#USER_ID# ,#SYSTEM_ID# ,#LYR_ID# ,#FILL_COLOR# ,#FILL_STYLE# ,#OUTLINE_COLOR# ,#OUTLINE_STYLE# ,#OUTLINE_WIDTH# ,#FONT_SIZE# ,#FONT_WEIGHT# ,#FONT_STYLE# ,#FONT_FAMILY# ,#FONT_COLOR# ,#GEOMETRY_TYPE# ,#MAXSCALE# ,#MINSCALE# ,#OPACITY# ,#LABEL_FIELD# ,#LEGEND_NUM# ,#LEGEND_NM# ,#MARKER_STYLE# )
sqlMap.update: DELETE FROM MAP_LYRDTL_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID# AND LYR_ID = #LYR_ID# AND LEGEND_NUM = #LEGEND_NUM#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM MAP_LYRDTL_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID# AND LYR_ID = #LYR_ID# AND LEGEND_NM = #LEGEND_NM# ORDER BY LYR_ID,LEGEND_NUM
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MAP_LYRDTL_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID# AND LYR_ID = #LYR_ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM MAP_LYRDTL_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID# ORDER BY LYR_ID,LEGEND_NUM
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO ( SEQ ,USER_ID ,GROUPLAYER_NAME ,LAYER_LIST ,USE_YN ,SYS_TYPE ) VALUES ( MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#USER_ID# ,#GROUPLAYER_NAME# ,#LAYER_LIST# ,#USE_YN# ,#SYS_TYPE# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE# AND GROUPLAYER_NAME = #GROUPLAYER_NAME#
SELECT * FROM MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE# AND GROUPLAYER_NAME NOT IN('default') ORDER BY SEQ
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO WHERE GROUPLAYER_NAME = #GROUPLAYER_NAME# AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO WHERE SEQ = #SEQ#
SELECT * FROM MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE# AND USE_YN = 'Y'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE#
UPDATE MAP_GROUPLAYER_INFO SET USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE SEQ = #SEQ#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MAP_LYRLIST_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_TYPE = #SYS_TYPE#
DELETE FROM MAP_LYRDTL_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM USV_COMPONENT WHERE 1=1
LAYERNAME = #LAYERNAME#
CAPTION = #CAPTION#
SELECT OBJECTID, (SELECT PROG_ID FROM USV_COMPONENT WHERE LAYERNAME = #LAYERNAME# ) AS PROG_ID FROM RDT_SDWK_DT WHERE RDA_IDN = #RDA_IDN#
SELECT OBJECTID, (SELECT PROG_ID FROM USV_COMPONENT WHERE LAYERNAME = #LAYERNAME#) AS PROG_ID FROM RDT_RDWY_DT WHERE RDA_IDN = #RDA_IDN#
SELECT SEQ, USER_ID, SYSTEM_ID, SCALE, XMAX, XMIN, YMAX, YMIN FROM MAP_FINAL_LOC WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MAP_FINAL_LOC ( SEQ ,USER_ID ,SYSTEM_ID ,SCALE ,XMAX ,XMIN ,YMAX ,YMIN ) VALUES ( SEQ_MAP_FINAL_LOC.NEXTVAL ,#USER_ID# ,#SYSTEM_ID# ,#SCALE# ,#XMAX# ,#XMIN# ,#YMAX# ,#YMIN# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MAP_FINAL_LOC SET SCALE = #SCALE#, XMAX = #XMAX#, XMIN = #XMIN#, YMAX = #YMAX#, YMIN = #YMIN# WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYSTEM_ID = #SYSTEM_ID#

MERGE INTO USV_USER_GROUP USING DUAL ON (USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID# AND GROUP_NAME = #GROUP_NAME#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET GROUP_LAYERS = #GROUP_LAYERS# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID, SYS_ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_LAYERS) VALUES (#USER_ID#, #SYS_ID#, #GROUP_NAME#, #GROUP_LAYERS#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM USV_USER_GROUP WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID#
GROUP_NAME = #GROUP_NAME#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM USV_USER_GROUP WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID# AND GROUP_NAME = #GROUP_NAME#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM USV_USER_CONFIG WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM USV_USER_CONFIG WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID#
sqlMap.update:
MERGE INTO USV_USER_SYMBOL USING DUAL ON (USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
SYMBOL_P = #SYMBOL_P# SYMBOL_L = #SYMBOL_L# SYMBOL_A = #SYMBOL_A# SYMBOL_T = #SYMBOL_T#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID, SYS_ID, SYMBOL_P, SYMBOL_L, SYMBOL_A, SYMBOL_T) VALUES (#USER_ID#, #SYS_ID#, #SYMBOL_P#, #SYMBOL_L#, #SYMBOL_A#, #SYMBOL_T#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM USV_USER_SYMBOL WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USV_USER_RENDERERS (USER_ID, SYS_ID, LAYER_ALIASNAME, RENDERER, MINSCALE, MAXSCALE, ISARROW) VALUES (#USER_ID#, #SYS_ID#, #LAYER_ALIASNAME#, #RENDERER:CLOB#, #MINSCALE#, #MAXSCALE#, #ISARROW#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE USV_USER_RENDERERS SET
RENDERER = #RENDERER:CLOB# MINSCALE = #MINSCALE# MAXSCALE = #MAXSCALE# ISARROW = #ISARROW#
WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID# AND LAYER_ALIASNAME = #LAYER_ALIASNAME#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM USV_USER_RENDERERS WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USV_USER_RENDERERS WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID# AND LAYER_ALIASNAME = #LAYER_ALIASNAME#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM USV_USER_RENDERERS WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND SYS_ID = #SYS_ID# AND LAYER_ALIASNAME = #LAYER_ALIASNAME#
